channel.title: Colwich Home & School Organization
channel.description: Recent content on Colwich Home & School Organization

item.description: Scores are average amount per student and will be updated daily once the competition begins. Remember, daily winners and school prizes are still available for everyone to claim and enjoy, so keep on playing! The top 3 classess will enjoy additional prizes!

This year we will have raffle items for the kids to try and win! Once the first school prize is unlocked, each student will be given 5 raffle tickets to put in baskets of their choice. Daily winners will receive an additional 5 raffle tickets per student. On Friday, tickets will be placed and the winners drawn during assembly.

item.title: ★ ACTIVITIES ★
item.description: We’ll also have these additional activities to enjoy! While they don’t give out Prize Room tickets, they do have their own prizes to be won.

item.title: ★ ATTRACTIONS ★
item.description: Module content text assuming that there is a sub page.

item.title: ★ CARNIVAL GAMES ★
item.description: This year we have 13 games for you to enjoy! Completing these games will win you prizes in the Prize Room. You can also find more fun and prizes in our additional Activities!

item.title: ★ FOOD & DRINK ★
item.description: We’ve got some tasty selections for you this year. Make sure you arrive hungry for the Meals. Then finish off with some Candy or Simply Sunday Snowcones. Or, luck your way into dessert at the Dessert Walk!

item.title: ★ Prize Room ★
item.description: Win tickets by playing the Carnival Games, and redeem them in the prize room. When you go through admissions, you’ll be given a punch card necklace. Upon completing each game, your necklace will get a punch. Prize room closes at 7:30pm.

item.title: ★ RAFFLE ★
item.description: This year we have over 25 raffle items for you to try and win! We’ve got more coming in, so be sure to check back. Tickets are on sale the night of Carnival from 5:00pm to 7:00pm, or you can purchase tickets in advance online. Raffle Book purchases are entered into the Door Prize. Raffle winners will be drawn at 7:15pm. Winners do not need to be present.

item.title: ■ Made Possible By ■
item.description: These amazing companies and charities who support our school.

item.title: ■ Made Possible By ■
item.description: The local businesses and charities who support our school!

item.title: ■ With Thanks To ■
item.description: The support of these local businesses who make Carnival possible.

item.title: ★ COMING SOON ★
item.description: We’re still finalizing the information for the Raffle this year. We’ve got lots of good baskets coming in, and we’ll update you as soon as we have all of the details worked out.

item.title: ★ NEED TO KNOW ★
item.description: Doors will open at 5:00pm on April 28th at the West School Entrance. Adults and Children under 2 get in free. Max $30 per family for entry. Cash, Credit & Checks accepted. We’ve got plenty of Games & Activities, Prizes, Raffle Items and Delicious Food. Also check out our Sponsors and Volunteers who make all of this possible! Read the FAQ for more information.

item.title: ★ RAFFLE PRE SALE ★
item.description: New this year, you can purchase Raffle tickets in advance! Just head to the Raffle Ticket Pre Sale Page to purchase them. Please consider sending the link to Grandparents, Aunts, Uncles, Friends and others who may not be able to attend Carnival. Or, save time by purchasing them for yourself, which gives you more time to enjoy the night of Carnival!

item.description: Module content text assuming that there is a sub page.

item.description: Module content text assuming that there is a sub page.

item.title: Coin Wars Navigation
item.description: Module content text assuming that there is a sub page.

item.title: Daily Winners
item.description: Daily winners are the class with the highest average per student on that day. They win an additional 5 raffle tickets per student, and get to pick a prize from the prize table!

item.title: Footer
item.description: Module content text assuming that there is a sub page.

item.title: Need To Know
item.description: For the week of March 10th - March 14th, each class will have a collection container in the front lobby. Classes will compete to raise the highest average amount per student. Students can also reach out to relatives who don’t live nearby with our online payments. Additionally, there will be daily prizes, raffle baskets and school prizes! Read the Rules or Track the Leaderboard to play along.

item.title: Rewards For All
item.description: Each time we pass a fundraising milestone, a prize that can be enjoyed by all students will be unlocked! So far, we have raised $9,663.80! Let’s see how far we can get.
